function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Human-to-human transmission of COVID-19 through respiratory droplets","Impact":"Potential for rapid spread of the virus and increased likelihood of infection","Mitigation":"Use of face masks, social distancing, and proper ventilation","Technologies":"Air purifiers, HVAC systems with HEPA filters, and UV-C light disinfection","People":"Individuals in close contact with infected persons","Owner":"Public health agencies, individuals, and businesses"},{"Description":"Potential transmission of COVID-19 via unsymptomatic individuals","Impact":"Increased difficulty in identifying and isolating infected individuals","Mitigation":"Regular testing and contact tracing, promotion of awareness about asymptomatic transmission","Technologies":"Rapid antigen tests, contact tracing apps, and educational campaigns","People":"Community members, healthcare workers","Owner":"Public health agencies, healthcare facilities"},{"Description":"Survival of COVID-19 virus on surfaces","Impact":"Potential for indirect transmission through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Frequent disinfection of high-touch surfaces, promotion of hand hygiene","Technologies":"Disinfectants, UV-C light sanitation devices, touchless fixtures","People":"Individuals in public spaces and workplaces","Owner":"Facility managers, business owners, and individuals"}]}
